name: The Forgotten Isle Alpha 0.01
description:
The newest project from Onslaught, The Forgotten Isle.

Updated 05/10/2018 to Alpha 0.01

What is inside:

-See Dev Log for updates.

-12 Custom Made classes. Custom stat curves, skills , and equipment.

-Name selection and gender selection: Something that was missing from the last demo.

-HOPEFULLY... A complete lack of bugs. 

Any support is fully appreciated, so if you wish to donate, you can do so here or at our Patreon (link below). Or, share this with your friends.

Thank you so much!

Onslaught Patreon
